level.heading: LIMITATIONS ON THE USE OF TRANSITION COMMITTEE FUNDS (ยง 3-4005)

level.text: Transition committee funds shall be used solely for the purpose of facilitating the office and personnel transition on behalf of either the Chairman of the Council or the Mayor.

The provisions of ยง 3013 of Chapter 30 of this title, concerning impermissible uses of campaign funds, shall apply to transition committees, unless the expenditures stated therein are solely related to activities necessary to facilitate the office and personnel transition on behalf of the newly elected official.
